bossDialog: (Screeching loudly, the Wolpertinger hurls itself at you in a violent, frothing rage! It's astounding these things don't die of pure rage. Nothing should be THAT angry.)
(The Wolpertinger gets so mad at the sight of you it starts thrashing around and drooling all over itself. What an utter mess of a creature. You'll have to deal with it if you want the treasure!)
(You spot a cute bunny! Except then you spot the antlers, wings, and enraged twitching glare, and soon think twice about petting it. You order your creatures to "pet" it instead.)

cardBonuses.3: Your creatures have a 5% chance to {ACTION_attack} an additional time.
cardBonuses.6: Your creatures have a 5% chance to {ACTION_cast} spells an additional time.
cardBonuses.9: Doubles the chance for these effects to occur.

master.dialog: Wolpertingers have access to powerful Scourge magic that will wipe your creatures off the face of this planet. Prepare yourself!
master.name: Nimet

name: Wolpertinger
